org.ietf.nea.pt.message

Class PtTlsMessageFactoryIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.message.PtTlsMessageFactoryIetf

  • public final class PtTlsMessageFactoryIetf
extends Object
    Factory utility to create an IETF RFC 6876 compliant transport message.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long VENDORID 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      private PtTlsMessageFactoryIetf()
      Private constructor should never be invoked.

      • createExperimental

        public PtTlsMessage createExperimental(long identifier,
                              String content)
                                throws ValidationException
        Creates an experimental transport message with the given content.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the monotonically increasing message identifier
        content - the message content
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 6876 compliant transport message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values
